name: google-maps-search
title: Google Maps Search
description: Quickly search Google Maps or get directions.
author: ratoru

commands.name: searchPlaces
commands.title: Search Places
commands.subtitle: Google Maps
commands.description: Search for places and see detailed information and a map view. Enable autofill to use selected text or clipboard.

commands.name: findNearbyPlaces
commands.title: Find Nearby Places
commands.subtitle: Google Places
commands.description: Find places near your home or current location.

commands.name: travelHome
commands.title: Get Me Home
commands.subtitle: Google Maps
commands.description: Open Google Maps with directions from your current location to your home.

commands.name: quickSearchMaps
commands.title: Quickly Search Google Maps
commands.subtitle: Google Maps
commands.description: Quickly search for a place or category on Google Maps.

preferences.name: googlePlacesApiKey
preferences.title: Google Places API Key
preferences.description: Enter your Google Places API key. Required for place details and map features.
preferences.information: Get your API key from the Google Cloud Console: https://console.cloud.google.com/

preferences.name: homeAddress
preferences.title: Home Address
preferences.placeholder: Street Address, City, State, ZIP Code

preferences.name: preferredMode
preferences.title: Preferred Mode of Transport
preferences.description: Select your preferred type of transport.

preferences.name: useSelected
preferences.title: Use selected text or clipboard to fill destination
preferences.label: Enable Autofill
preferences.description: Check this box to autofill destination using selected text or clipboard (if no text selected).

preferences.name: saveSearchHistory
preferences.title: Save Search History
preferences.label: Save and suggest past searches
preferences.description: Check this box to save and suggest past searches.

preferences.name: showMapInSidebar
preferences.title: Show Map in Place Details
preferences.label: Show Maps
preferences.description: Check this box to show a map when viewing place details.

preferences.name: defaultSortOrder
preferences.title: Default Sort Order
preferences.description: Choose how search results should be sorted by default.

tools.name: findPlaces
tools.title: Find Places
tools.description: Search for places by name, address, or category

tools.name: findNearbyPlaces
tools.title: Find Nearby Places
tools.description: Find places near a specified location

tools.name: getPlaceDetails
tools.title: Get Place Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific place

mocks.findPlaces:
Here are some places matching "restaurants in San Francisco":

- **Lazy Bear**
  Address: 3416 19th St, San Francisco, CA 94110, USA
  Rating: 4.5/5
  Status: Open Now
  [View on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps/search/Lazy+Bear+3416+19th+St%2C+San+Francisco%2C+CA+94110%2C+USA)

- **Nopa**
  Address: 560 Divisadero St, San Francisco, CA 94117, USA
  Rating: 4.6/5
  Status: Closed
  [View on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nopa+560+Divisadero+St%2C+San+Francisco%2C+CA+94117%2C+USA)

- **State Bird Provisions**
  Address: 1529 Fillmore St, San Francisco, CA 94115, USA
  Rating: 4.5/5
  Status: Open Now
  [View on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps/search/State+Bird+Provisions+1529+Fillmore+St%2C+San+Francisco%2C+CA+94115%2C+USA)

evals.input: @google-maps-search tell me about the Ferry Building in San Francisco

mocks.getPlaceDetails:
# Ferry Building

**Address**: Ferry Building, San Francisco, CA 94111, USA
**Phone**: +1 415-983-8000
**Website**: [https://www.ferrybuildingmarketplace.com/](https://www.ferrybuildingmarketplace.com/)
**Rating**: ★★★★★ (4.7) based on 25,413 reviews
**Price Level**: $$

**Status**: Open Now

**Opening Hours**:
- Monday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Thursday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Friday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM
- Sunday: 8:00 AM – 10:00 PM

**Categories**: tourist_attraction, food, point_of_interest, establishment

**Links**:
- [View on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps/search/Ferry+Building+Ferry+Building%2C+San+Francisco%2C+CA+94111%2C+USA)
- [Get Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=Ferry+Building%2C+San+Francisco%2C+CA+94111%2C+USA&travelmode=driving)

evals.input: @google-maps-search how do I get from Fisherman's Wharf to Alcatraz Island?

mocks.getDirections:
## Directions to Alcatraz Island

From: Fisherman's Wharf
To: Alcatraz Island
Mode: Driving

[Open Directions in Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&origin=Fisherman%27s+Wharf&destination=Alcatraz+Island&travelmode=driving)

You can view turn-by-turn directions, traffic information, and estimated travel time by opening the link in Google Maps.
